alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; North Cass; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 8:39PM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with local amounts up to 6 inches along the Interstate 35 corridor of Pine to southern St Louis County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...St. Louis, Cass, South Itasca, Crow Wing, Aitkin, Carlton and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Mille Lacs Band, Big Sandy Lake, Hinckley, East Lake and, Lena Lake areas and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
